{{Infobox egg |name = Electric Egg |image = [[File:Bag_Electric_Egg_Sprite.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Electric Egg''. |price = 1000 {{Questpoints}} |location = [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Vermilion City]], [[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Olivine City]], [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Mauville City]], [[Towns_%26_Cities#Sinnoh_Cities_.26_Towns|Sunyshore City]], [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Nimbasa City]] }} ===Description=== An '''Electric Egg''' is a type of Pokémon [[Egg]] that can hatch Electric-type Pokémon. ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn !! Sinnoh !! Unova !! --- |- | [[File:Pikachu.png|40px]] Pikachu || [[File:Mareep.png|40px]] Mareep || [[File:Plusle.png|40px]] Plusle || [[File:Shinx.png|40px]] Shinx ||

Price |- | [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Vermilion City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Olivine City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Mauville City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Sunyshore City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Unova:_Locations_and_items|Nimbasa City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Kalos:_Locations_and_items|Lumiose City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |} {{Eggs}}
